import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()]

ans = 0
for i in range(1, n):
    if a[i] > a[i - 1] + 1:
        ans = max(ans, a[i - 1] - a[i] + 1)

print(ans)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()]

ans = 0
for i in range(1, n):
    if a[i] > a[i - 1] + 1:
        ans = max(ans, a[i - 1] - a[i] + 1)

print(ans)

def solution():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    left = 0
    right = n - 1
    res = 0
    while left <= right:
        if a[left] < a[right]:
            res = max(res, right - left + 1)
            left += 1
            right += 1
        else:
            res = max(res, right - left + 1)
            right -= 1
    print(res)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    solution()
